top.title: Bench-2-CoP: Can We Trust Benchmarking for EU AI Compliance?
top.summary: Authors: Matteo Prandi , Vincenzo Suriani , Federico Pierucci , Marcello Galisai , Daniele Nardi , Piercosma Bisconti View a PDF of the paper titled Bench-2-CoP: Can We Trust Benchmarking for EU AI Compliance?, by Matteo Prandi and 5 other authors View PDF HTML (experimental) Abstract: The rapid advancement of General Purpose AI (GPAI) models necessitates robust evaluation frameworks, especially with emerging regulations like the EU AI Act and its associated Code of Practice (CoP).
